Package gov.tak.api.engine.map.cache

Class AbstractCacheTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.api.engine.map.cache.AbstractCacheTrigger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DownloadCacheTrigger, SmartCacheTrigger
    public abstract class AbstractCacheTrigger
extends java.lang.Object
    Base definition of all trigger types of the caching service

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractCacheTrigger

        public AbstractCacheTrigger​(@NonNull
                            Geometry geometry,
                            int priority,
                            double minResolution,
                            double maxResolution,
                            java.lang.String cacheSource,
                            java.lang.String cacheSink)
        Create cache trigger providing all base values
        Parameters:
        geometry - geometry defining the trigger region (required)
        priority - the priority of the trigger from lowest to highest (optional)
        minResolution - minimum meters-per-pixel resolution of the trigger (optional)
        maxResolution - maximum meters-per-pixel resolution of the trigger (optional)
        cacheSource - the associated cache source (source / sink are optional if both are null)
        cacheSink - the associated cache sink (source / sink are optional if both are null)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when required arguments are not provided
